name: GCOMM
tag_list: information-technology, australia, telecommunications, wholesale-internet, resale-internet, cloud-services, cloud-backup, cloud-storage, iaas, voice-over-ip, voip, sip, secure-private-network, private-wan, managed-services, msp, security, hosting, spam-pr
overview:
GCOMM PTY Ltd. is a business internet services and Information Technology company headquartered in Gold Coast, Australia. The company also has a satellite office in Sydney and data centre points of presence in Gold Coast, Sydney, Melbourne, Perth, and Brisbane as of late 2011.

GCOMM’s products and services consist of Secure Private Networks (Private IPs, Private WAN), Cloud Backup, Cloud Storage, Cloud Security, Internet, IT hosting, SIP/VoIP, and Managed Services suites for both LAN and WAN networks.

GCOMM also has a very active partner program that allows businesses to become either resellers or wholesalers of GCOMM’s Australia wide MPLS IP network and internet services.

GCOMM has been growing at a rate of over 30% for the past three consecutive years.

GCOMM’s clients consist of many of Australia’s top ASX listed businesses. GCOMM is listed as #157 on Queensland Business Review’s 2011 Q400 list of top privately owned Queensland businesses and has made the list for the past three consecutive years. GCOMM was also awarded as the top IT & Multimedia company in the Gold Coast by the Gold Coast Business Excellence Awards for both 2010 and 2011.
